General Instructions:

Drag those seven plates to form up the pattern displayed in the lower right corner.

You can drag a plate out of the upper boundary to rotate it.

Remember to hold on the plate and drag it back. Otherwise you will never win the game.

For TA's reference, if you want to go through the game quickly. The solution to hard mode is here.

Please please follow the solution, enjoy the rapid game within one minute!
